data.fullContent: As the temperature warmed up, Tracey began counting the days until she would be able to install her new fridge. She had reserved a brand new fridge to replace her broken one. She had gone to the hardware store every week for several months to check on the status of her order. She had even called the store a few times to see if her fridge was in. The store told her it would be there in a few days, but they were wrong every time. Then, at last, the day came when her new fridge arrived. The delivery person brought it to her house. She was so surprised when she saw that they had brought her a hot pink fridge.

q1.translation: 随着气温回升，特蕾西开始数着日子，盼望着能安装新冰箱。她订了一个崭新的冰箱来换坏了的。几个月来，她每周都去五金店检查订单的状态。
q1.front: As the temperature warmed up, Tracey began counting the days until she would be able to install her new fridge. She had reserved a brand new fridge to replace her broken one. She had gone to the hardware store every week for several months to check on the status of her order.

q2.translation: 随着气温回升，特蕾西开始数着日子，盼望着能安装新冰箱。她订了一个崭新的冰箱来换坏了的。几个月来，她每周都去五金店检查订单的状态。她甚至给商店打了几次电话，看看冰箱是否在。商店告诉她过几天就会到，但他们每次都错了。终于有一天，她的新冰箱到了。快递员把它送到了她家。当她看到他们给她带来了一个亮粉色的冰箱时，她非常惊讶。
q2.front: As the temperature warmed up, Tracey began counting the days until she would be able to install her new fridge. She had reserved a brand new fridge to replace her broken one. She had gone to the hardware store every week for several months to check on the status of her order.
q2.middle: She had even called the store a few times to see if her fridge was in.
q2.ending: The store told her it would be there in a few days, but they were wrong every time. Then, at last, the day came when her new fridge arrived. The delivery person brought it to her house. She was so surprised when she saw that they had brought her a hot pink fridge.
